comments.body: I agree with @vors. I would ask writers to please review our existing documentation, and use it to build PowerShell from start to finish. I definitely want more and improved documentation, but the best documentation is written organically as part of the development process of a project, so following the existing documentation all the way through would allow us to much better identify what's missing, what's good, and what needs to be improved.
